localResource.name: Cluster
localResource.label: Cluster
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id, delete_date, CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN RTrim(cast(cluster_name as varchar)) ELSE cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || cast(delete_date as varchar) || ')' END as combo_name, 0 as sort FROM v3_0_cluster_configuration_view WHERE cluster_id in (SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id FROM v3_0_vm_configuration_view WHERE history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_vm_configuration_view a GROUP BY a.vm_id) AND create_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END AND (delete_date IS NULL OR (delete_date >= CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) AND delete_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END)) $P!{is_deleted}) AND datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid) AND history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_cluster_configuration_view a GROUP BY a.cluster_id) AND create_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END AND (delete_date IS NULL OR (delete_date >= CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) AND delete_date <= CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Daily' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 day' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '3 month' WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Yearly' THEN CAST($P{P_Start_Date} as TIMESTAMP) + interval '1 year' END)) $P!{is_deleted} UNION ALL SELECT distinct cast('11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' as uuid), cast(null as timestamp), value, 1 FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view WHERE enum_type = 'REPORTS_ALL' AND enum_key = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC, delete_date DESC, combo_name
